attributes.action: MPs who break Covid rules must be suspended without pay
attributes.additional_details: If those who make the rules break them , the public loses confidence in Parliament and the Government and will result in poor compliance by the public endangering public health
attributes.background: Parliament must lead by example and suspend MPs without pay if Covid rules are broken.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

It's already the case that MPs who damage the integrity and reputation of the House of Commons can be subject to sanctions.  You can find out more here:

https://publications.parliament.uk/pa/cm201719/cmcode/1882/188202.htm#_idTextAnchor003
	
You can find out more about the Standards and how to make a complaint here:

https://www.parliament.uk/mps-lords-and-offices/standards-and-financial-interests/parliamentary-commissioner-for-standards/
